meanings.definition: An account given of a particular matter, especially in the form of an official document, after thorough investigation or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked the students to write reports on their science experiments.
meanings.sent2: The news reports on the weather are broadcast every evening.
meanings.sent3: The cat's report on the missing toy mouse was quite detailed.
meanings.sent4: The reports of alien sightings in the area were causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent5: The reports of the treasure hidden in the old house intrigued the explorers.

meanings.definition: To give a spoken or written account of something that one has observed, heard, done, or investigated.
meanings.sent1: She reports the news on the radio every morning.
meanings.sent2: He reports any suspicious activity to the police immediately.
meanings.sent3: The parrot reports back everything it hears in the house.
meanings.sent4: The detective reports finding a clue at the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The journalist reports live from the scene of the protest.
